content:
2020-03-23_08-38-19-342x103.png
Is there any use of the home icon in the navbar or it just indicates All messages stream? I find that behavior somewhat inconsistent with the design. Like on clicking any other option (for example Private messages) shows the whole stream name rather than its icon.

For what it's worth, a new version of the navbar is in the works and this is the screenshot that was shared:

Screenshot-89.png

See #design > top navbar

Shubham Gupta said:

2020-03-23_08-38-19-342x103.png
Is there any use of the home icon in the navbar or it just indicates All messages stream? I find that behavior somewhat inconsistent with the design. Like on clicking any other option (for example Private messages) shows the whole stream name rather than its icon.

yeah correct!
